name: Shadow Crown
description:
Shadow crown is a first person roguelike dungeon crawler where you take controll of Either the fearsome barbarian or the powerful sorceress and try to survive the crypt of the fallen king Agrippa and retrieve the all powerful  shadow crown.

Shadow crown is in the alpha stage of development any and all feedback is welcome and appreciated .

All programing, art, and design by Joshua D. Peace.

Additional sound effects  from soundjay.com

Controls

Click on the onscreen buttons to perform the actions they portray  Ex(arrows to move sword to attack).
